item.title: Making a Minecraft Server on IdleyHost
item.description: Making a Minecraft Server on IdleyHost So, you probably haven’t heard of idleyhost, but it is a server hosting organization based on Discord. They provide free Minecraft servers with 2gb of RAM, and have a referral system so you can get better specs. In this article I will show you how to make a 1.16.4 Paper Server Logging in So when you go to the idleyhost site You need to login.
